Portal 2 is a phenomenal game by Valve and a true successor to its first one. Not my first time playing this, I've played this before Steam like 4 times and now this completing it in 6 hours is kinda short, looking forward to trying the co-op. Such an amazing story, visuals, gameplay, everything on par especially the design of the gigantic structures just like how in Half-Life there's Black Mesa. Not to forget about the voice acting, in general, is "the cherry on top", IMO J.K Simmons nailed it voicing "Cave Johnson" making me imagine how his facial expression was every time he talks. I wish if there is a new Portal game in the works or going to be, who knows. Overall, Highly recommended, every gamer or a newcomer should play this. 10/10

Valve never disappoints. That might be an overstatement but come on, Portal 2 is one of the best Valve games. The first one was simple and pretty unique when it came to introducing the portal gun and the powerful AI that is GLaDOS. So when fans wanted more, lord Gabe came out of the heavens and gave the public Portal 2. And all of us were pleased with what we got. First time playing this was amazing. Wheatley will always be one of the funniest characters in video game history. The game changed what we thought the first portal had in story. Such as the backstory of GLaDOS and Cave Johnson. I had no problems playing this game. Honestly I believe its in the top 5 best steam games. And one of many to never have a 3 in it's title

Un escenario tan diverso, aventuras sin igual, excelente jugabilidad, y una atm√≥sfera sin igual que te envuelve a lo largo del juego. Misterios, uno que otro chiste, de los mejores juegos y la verdad que no me canso rejugarlo. 
El hecho de crear c√°maras de pruebas le da un toque genial, y jugar modo cooperativo, pfff, excepcional. a fun physics puzzle game. If you haven't played it, buy it NOW.

By far one of the best games I have ever played, actually I would say it IS the best game I've ever played. Not only is the story line intriguing and fascinating, it's also engaging and fun! I highly recommend this game to ANYONE. And the best part is, I use a 7 year old laptop as of right now, and the game runs so perfectly and smoothly on it. and that's something I almost never experience, but this game looks so nice, plays amazingly, and can give you hours of play time and keeping your mind engaged with all the puzzles. not to mention the multi-player. it's so fun to explore around with friends, you could even mess with them too. I give this game a solid 11/10 for anyone looking for a fun game to mess around in. I highly recommend this game because it is an immediate classic, and can offer game play for ANY play style
The concept is awesome, the graphics is great and the puzzles are hard but not too hard. An excellent game!
I loved this game it is totally awesome! There is a great story and some good problem solving tests. The characters are wonderful. I would suggest this to any and everyone.

Portal 2 is possibly the best single player game I have ever played. The puzzles are creative, fun, and not too challenging to make you quit. The story is also amazing, with few characters being great. If you have not played this game, you should.
